results.name: Project Explore
results.short_description:
Project Explore is a casual, action, adventure, and simulation game developed by Seabass and Gazelle Studios. It was originally released in 2015. Seabass and Gazelle Studios published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh". 
You can play Project Explore on Linux and PC. You can purchase the game on Steam.

results.name: Planet Nomads
results.short_description:
Planet Nomads is an indie, action, adventure, and simulation game developed by Craneballs. It was originally released in 2017. Craneballs published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh". 
You can play Planet Nomads on Linux, macOS, and PC. You can purchase the game on Steam and GOG.

results.name: Custom Town
results.short_description:
Custom Town is an indie, action, adventure, and RPG game developed by CFM Games. It came out on August 24, 2016. It was published by CFM Games. 
Custom Town is available on PC. You can purchase the game on Steam.

results.name: Rollers of the Realm
results.short_description:
Rollers of the Realm is an indie, action, adventure, and RPG game developed by Atlus U.S.A., Inc. and Phantom Compass. It was originally released in 2014. It was published by Atlus USA. Rollers of the Realm has a Metascore of 68, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG. 
Rollers of the Realm is available on PC, PlayStation 4, and PS Vita. You can purchase the game on Steam and PlayStation Store.

results.name: Downwell
results.short_description:
Downwell is an indie, action, adventure, and arcade game developed by Devolver Digital and Moppin. It was originally released in 2015. It was published by GHI Media. Downwell has a Metascore of 81, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended". 
You can play Downwell on Nintendo Switch, PC, iOS, and PS Vita. You can purchase the game on Nintendo eShop, PlayStation Store, Steam, and GOG. 
Eirik Suhrke scored the game.

results.name: Dust: An Elysian Tail
results.short_description:
Dust: An Elysian Tail is an indie, action, adventure, and RPG game developed by Humble Hearts LLC. It came out on August 15, 2012. It was published by Humble Hearts LLC. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG. 
Dust: An Elysian Tail is available on Linux, PC, iOS, and macOS. The game is sold via Nintendo eShop, PlayStation Store, GOG, and Steam. 
Alexander Brandon and Hyperduck Soundworks scored the game.

results.name: Bot Colony
results.short_description:
Bot Colony is a casual, adventure, RPG, and strategy game developed by North Side. It came out on June 16, 2014. North Side published the game. 
Bot Colony is available on PC. The game is sold via Steam.

results.name: DARCO - Reign of Elements
results.short_description:
DARCO - Reign of Elements is an indie, action, adventure, and simulation game developed by TP-STUDIOS. It was originally released in 2018. It was published by TP-STUDIOS. 
You can play DARCO - Reign of Elements on PC. The game is sold via Steam.

results.name: BackToNormal
results.short_description:
BackToNormal is a casual, massively multiplayer, action, and adventure game developed by BackToNormal Studio SRL. 
BackToNormal is available on PC. The game is sold via Steam.

results.name: Lost In Woods 2
results.short_description:
Lost In Woods 2 is an indie, action, adventure, and strategy game developed by Crouching Fox. It was originally released in 2016. It was published by Dagestan Technology. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh". 
You can play Lost In Woods 2 on PC. The game is sold via Steam.
